subject: Three must read articles
body:
Below are three must-read articles. The last one is in French—particularly important—and can be instantly translated with a single click. It’s well worth your time, as it could have major implications for Bitcoin if proven true.

———————————————————————————

Market Updates

Upgrade: https://update.10xresearch.com/upgrade
